ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups sun-dried tomato and oregano salad dressing
ingredients.normalizedName: Sun-Dried Tomato And Oregano Salad Dressing

ingredients.ingredient: 2 red bell peppers, halved and seeded
1 head romaine lettuce - rinsed, dried, and torn into bite-size pieces
½ cup sun-dried tomato and oregano salad dressing
ingredients.normalizedName: Sun-Dried Tomato And Oregano Salad Dressing

cookingTips: Grill chicken and peppers until slightly charred for added depth of flavor
Let cooked chicken cool before slicing to maintain juiciness
Dress salad just before serving to prevent lettuce from wilting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user achieve properly grilled chicken with good char marks while keeping it juicy, and balance the salad dressing so it coats without overwhelming.
